channel.title: xres on Mr Beaner - Put Coffee in your rice!
channel.description: Recent content in xres on Mr Beaner - Put Coffee in your rice!

item.title: urxvt
item.description: Nothing special. I really like to be able to change font (and font-size) on the fly, there are times when you want to read the output and theres times you just want to monitor. I am planning to add something similar to be able to switch between a dark and light color-scheme.
